content.new:
I've been using gazebo through ROS - electric and now fuerte. I used the gazebo_pr2 stack as a starting point for generating URDF files.
In Electric all cameras (stereo and mono) use gazebo_ros_camera to simulate data and the left/right wide_stereo came
content.old:
I've been using gazebo through ROS - electric and now fuerte. I used the gazebo_pr2 stack as a starting point for generating URDF files.
In Electric all cameras (stereo and mono) use gazebo_ros_camera to simulate data and the left/right wide_stereo camer

message.raw: Marking this critical as we need synchronized camera images for simulating the DRC robot head sensor.
message.html: Marking this critical as we need synchronized camera images for simulating the DRC robot head sensor.
